metadata.description: WOOF üê∂ Who‚Äôs ready for the bullyverse takeover! For all of our pet lovers out there in the Web 3 world this is the project and community for you! Get ready to add some bark to your NFT collection with the upcoming release of the 5000 Male Bully NFT collection! The bullies are in for a treat! Every bully has exclusive token air drops in store for them! And that's not all, you'll also have the ability to stake your NFT and earn rewards!
